Name: The Final Boss
About the game: Play as Final Boss and kill all the heroes coming to your room. Kill heroes and earn gold to buy new skills. Place your weapons in such a way as to kill enemies before they get close to you. Otherwise you can always teleport far away When the situation gets hot, a good missile can solve everything. Features 6 Bosses to play 3 different scenarios (fantasy, space e modern) Every boss has a different play style Endless mode to unlock Tribute to '80 games
